book.synopsis: For readers with an aversion to syrupy verse: a delightful, inexpensively priced collection of vintage verse with an amusingly irreverent mood. 49 examples of rare 19th-century black humor\x80\x94each accompanied by clever drawings\x80\x94will delight readers with their stinging humor and outrageous wit.
book.title_long: Ruthless Rhymes for Heartless Homes and More Ruthless Rhymes
book.dimensions: Height: 8.75 Inches, Length: 5.25 inches, Weight: 0.0992080179 Pounds, Width: 0.25 inches
